1.title: Shark Reef

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

1.plot: See how sharks can thrive while local people still can fish in Belize.

2.title: The Sacred Island

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

2.plot: Find out why Carl Safina believes Islam could be a key to ocean conservation in large parts of the world.

3.title: Destination Baja

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

3.plot: Learn how fishermen in Mexico stopped hunting gray whales and developed a lucrative whale-watching co-op.

4.title: Swordfish! Part 1

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

4.plot: (Part 1 of 2) Join Carl Safina as he goes to sea with some of the last remaining swordfish harpooners.

5.title: Swordfish! Part 2

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

5.plot: (Part 2 of 2) Join Carl Safina as he goes to sea with some of the last remaining swordfish harpooners.

7.title: River of Kings: Part 2

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

7.plot: (Part 2 of 2) Examine the major project, led by the Nisqually Indian tribe, restoring the Nisqually River.

8.title: Trinidad's Turtle Giants

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

8.plot: Learn how Trinidad transformed leatherback turtles from shark bait to tourist attraction.

9.title: Cod Comeback?

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

9.plot: Join Carl Safina to find signs that the famous codfish of New England just might, indeed, be coming back.

10.title: Scourge of the Lionfish

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

10.plot: Learn how lionfish are damaging native species in the Caribbean and along the Atlantic coast.

-1.title: River of Kings

episode of.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (TV Series 2012–2013)

-1.plot: (Part 1 of 2) Examine the major project, led by the Nisqually Indian tribe, restoring the Nisqually River.

imdb.plot outline: Saving the Ocean is about people solving problems. The news is grim: overfishing, pollution, coral reefs are in trouble. A group of unsung heroes - scientists, conservationists, and local communities are hard at work with solutions. Join marine biologist and writer Carl Safina, founder of the Blue Ocean Institute, as he takes viewers around the globe to bring back good news from the world's oceans.
imdb.title: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina
akas: Saving the Ocean with Carl Safina (United States)
plot: Saving the Ocean is about people solving problems. The news is grim: overfishing, pollution, coral reefs are in trouble. A group of unsung heroes - scientists, conservationists, and local communities are hard at work with solutions. Join marine biologist and writer Carl Safina, founder of the Blue Ocean Institute, as he takes viewers around the globe to bring back good news from the world's oceans.
